projects.title: Web Application Development for Daimler projects
projects.description: Taking development lead for multiple web projects (backend and frontend) for ETECUTRE's customer projects.
achievements: Created a new build system (webpack)
Created a new starter kit for react
Developed a NodeJs backend with Sequelize SQL and PostGres
Set up OpenAPI with SwaggerUI for our middleware

Set up a JSON Webtoken Authentication for our middleware
Created Docker Compose yaml build scripts
Set up a Docker Cluster with reverse proxy (traefik)

projects.title: Developing a gaming platform

achievements: Created middleware and microservices
Set up Docker scripts
Implemented a global logging solution for microservices in a container environment
PoC for migrating their web app from angular 1.x to react
Set up a webpack job to dynamically inject configuration to the frontend at runtime

projects.title: Backend Development of an appointment scheduling system

achievements: Refactored microservices
Wrote unit tests with Lab
Wrote intergration tests with postman
Created new template for Lout (API documentation for HapiJs)
Developed a new mongo DB layer with promise support

projects.title: jQuery with Oracle Siebel OpenUI

projects.title: JavaEE WebApp with Oracle ADF
projects.description: Stryker – New Sales Attribution Tool: Planning, design and implementation of an JavaEE application for multi-na-tional (EMEA) and multi-lingual (English, German, French, Italian) Territory Management. Ec4u expert consulting covers all processes: Requirements and needs analysis, project lead and management, development, customizing, delivery and training.
achievements: Independent development of a JavaEE web application which unifies and simplifies processes from Oracle Sales Cloud (Fusion CRM) Territory Management
Development of SOA interfaces to integrate Oracle Sales Cloud (Fusion CRM) with other legacy systems
Independent development of a JavaEE / Oracle ADF web application which represents the process of Invoice Exception Management
Management and deployment for Oracle Java & Database Cloud Service
